reviewText: Erika Jordan is hot here as is Anita Dark.

Beautiful women shot seductively and without distracting edit and pan change ups.

I actually learned to appreciate the fashion as well.

There's a thin dialogue and story-line that stitches the scenes together and adds subtle humor.

Don't be fooled that outfit she wears on the cover is not in the video.  She does wear it in the the picture real though.
For me all the girls hair was too curly.  I like it straight like the cover photograph.  It follows Erika Jordan around as a narrator who is too horny to concentrate on her advertising campaign.  The inclusion of Shay Laren is nice, but duplicated on another DVD.  If you want to know which one just ask so you don't re-buy used scenes.
